duties_responsibilities.duty: Reviewing all plans and specifications for compliance with building codes and regulations.
Providing technical direction and assistance to inspection personnel.
Interacting with municipal clients and their staff.
Attending meetings, educational seminars, and functions related to building codes.
Performing inspections on an as-needed basis and providing code interpretation in the field.

education_certification.credential: 3-5 years of combined experience in building department field inspection and plans examiner duties
